page.title: 05INDUSTRIAL ESTATES/FACTORIES
page.content: {INDUSTRIAL ESTATES AND SINGLE {FACTORIES} { We have one old factory "Mattesons" and one modern factory"Herman Miller" and two industrial estates in our block.We wanted to know why all the factories didn't choose to be on an industrial estate.On an industrial estate the sites are usually custom_built for the purpose.This costs a lot of money because you have to know how big you expect your business to be in the future.You have to fit your place out ready for production.The good thing is that your factory can be easily found by strangers to the area because you are all together. You have good access to your place and good loading and parking facilities.
